name: MLComputeUnits
desc: The set of processing-unit configurations the model can use to make predictions.

items.name: case all
items.desc: The option you choose to allow the model to use all compute units available, including the neural engine.

items.name: case cpuOnly
items.desc: The option you choose to limit the model to only use the CPU.

items.name: case cpuAndGPU
items.desc: The option you choose to allow the model to use both the CPU and GPU, but not the neural engine.
